name: Derp Souls
description:
You are the DERPED ONE! Go forth and derp!


Derp Souls is a third person parody action rpg game. Use your trusty carrot sword as you wander through the wastelands encountering strange NPC's and angry appliances.

Fight deadly enemies like these
    [Trash Bin]
    [Portable Air Conditioner]
    [Office Chair]
    [Refrigerator]
    [Oven]

Derp Souls will be the weirdest game you play this year! (unless you've played our other game available on Steam--> Nightmare Puppeteer)

The game has one level + one boss fight rn. We will add new levels, enemies, items if anyone plays this haha



Royalty free credits

Lots of music by Ross Bugden, Aliaksei Yukhnevich, and Darren Curtis.

This game uses a lot of royalty free music and models found on Sketchfab, youtube etc- if I forgot to credit you here and you want a credit contact us at our discord and let us know thanks.
